name: Ten Sec Dread
description:
You die every ten seconds!

No, really, your whole body regenerates all its pieces every ten seconds.
And with pieces I mean your bones.
You are a skeleton and you better like it!
Because that is what you are for the rest of your live.
That lasts 10 seconds.

Better make the most of it and play this game!

Features:
- A big heart!
- Many skeletons
- Pumpkin chain explosions
- Bones
- Bone physics
- Bone aesthetic
- Your death

Controls instructions are in the game.
- Alt + Enter changes to windowed mode
- Mousewheel lets you zoom in and out
